context_blocks.content:
# VIB3+ Essential Facts

## Working Systems
- **Faceted** - 2D geometric patterns (WORKING)
- **Quantum** - 3D lattice effects (WORKING)
- **Holographic** - Audio-reactive (WORKING)

## NOT Working
- **Polychora** - PLACEHOLDER ONLY, do not use

## What VIB3+ Creates
Shader-based animated backgrounds for web design:
- Landing page backgrounds
- Portfolio sites
- Interactive art
- Music visualizers

## What VIB3+ Does NOT Do
- Does NOT render literal 3D/4D geometric shapes
- "Hypercube" = hypercube-inspired pattern, not a wireframe
- "4D rotation" = shader morphing parameters

## Two Repositories
| Repo | Use For |
|------|--------|
| vib3-plus-engine | Embedding, customizing UI |
| vib34d-vib3plus | Building custom apps with SDK |

context_blocks.name: Workflow: Embedding VIB3+
context_blocks.content:
# Embedding VIB3+ in a Webpage

## When to Use
- Adding animated background to existing site
- Quick prototypes without build tools

## Steps

### 1. Choose System
`faceted`, `quantum`, or `holographic` (NOT polychora)

### 2. Choose Geometry (0-23)
```
geometry = coreIndex * 8 + baseIndex
Base (0-7): tetra, hypercube, sphere, torus, klein, fractal, wave, crystal
Core: 0=base, 1=hypersphere warp, 2=hypertetra warp
```

### 3. Embed via iframe
```html
<iframe 
  src="https://domusgpt.github.io/vib3-plus-engine/?system=holographic&geometry=5&hue=280"
  style="position:fixed;inset:0;width:100%;height:100%;border:none;z-index:-1">
</iframe>
```

### URL Parameters
| Param | Range | Purpose |
|-------|-------|--------|
| system | faceted/quantum/holographic | Render engine |
| geometry | 0-23 | Pattern type |
| hue | 0-360 | Base color |
| gridDensity | 5-100 | Detail |
| intensity | 0-1 | Brightness |
| speed | 0.1-3 | Animation rate |

See: docs/atlases/vib3/embedding.md

context_blocks.name: Workflow: Customizing VIB3+
context_blocks.content:
# Customizing VIB3+ Application

## When to Use
- Modify UI controls or layout
- Add new features
- Change defaults
- Remove elements

## Steps

### 1. Clone
```bash
git clone https://github.com/Domusgpt/vib3-plus-engine
```

### 2. Edit index.html
Everything is in `index.html` (~42KB). No build tools.

### 3. Use Global API
```javascript
window.switchSystem('holographic')  // faceted|quantum|holographic
window.selectGeometry(5)            // 0-23
window.updateParameter('hue', 280)  // any param
window.randomizeAll()               // randomize
```

### 4. Test with Keyboard
- `1-3` Switch systems (NOT 4)
- `Alt+Q/W/E/R/A/S/D/F` Geometries
- `Space` Randomize
- `?` Help modal

See: docs/atlases/vib3/customizing.md

# VIB3+ Parameters

## Rotation (6D)
| Param | Range |
|-------|-------|
| rot4dXY | -6.28 to 6.28 |
| rot4dXZ | -6.28 to 6.28 |
| rot4dYZ | -6.28 to 6.28 |
| rot4dXW | -6.28 to 6.28 |
| rot4dYW | -6.28 to 6.28 |
| rot4dZW | -6.28 to 6.28 |

## Visual
| Param | Range | Default |
|-------|-------|--------|
| gridDensity | 5-100 | 15 |
| morphFactor | 0-2 | 1.0 |
| chaos | 0-1 | 0.2 |
| speed | 0.1-3 | 1.0 |

## Color
| Param | Range | Default |
|-------|-------|--------|
| hue | 0-360 | 200 |
| saturation | 0-1 | 0.8 |
| intensity | 0-1 | 0.5 |

## Geometry Formula
`geometry = coreIndex * 8 + baseIndex`

Base 0-7: tetra, hypercube, sphere, torus, klein, fractal, wave, crystal
Core 0-2: base, hypersphere, hypertetra
